name: Cyrus Capital Partners
overview: Cyrus Capital Partners, L.P. is an employee owned hedge fund sponsor. The firm provides its services to pooled investment vehicles. It invests in the public equity and fixed income markets of the United States and Europe. The firm primarily invests in value stocks employing a fundamental analysis. It invests across the capital structure of leveraged companies throughout their life cycles, including those in financial distress, special situations, arbitrage, and seeks to generate attractive absolute returns that are not correlated to or dependent upon the general equity and fixed income markets. The firm was previously known as Och-Ziff Freidheim Capital Management. Cyrus Capital Partners was founded in August, 1999 and is based in New York, New York with additional offices in London, United Kingdom and Stamford, Connecticut.

funding_round.source_description: EdeniQ Gets $32 Million to Extract Plant Sugars for Biofuel
